subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: It is thought that the final leg of the Triple Crown requires a special style and “a high cruising speed.” No horse has won all three races since 1978.
snippet: It is thought that the final leg of the Triple Crown requires a special style and “a high cruising speed.” No horse has won all three races since 1978.
